onboarding.title: Impostazione portafoglio
onboarding.sync_desc: Se hai già l'estensione Metetamask o un altro portafolgio, sincronizzalo od importalo per gestire le tue risorse.
onboarding.create_desc: Imposta il tuo primo portafoglio ed inizia ad esplorare le applicazioni decentralizzate.
onboarding.import: Importane uno esistente o creane uno nuovo
onboarding.optin_back_desc: Per favore approva o disapprova l'utilizzo dei dati di analisi. Puoi aggiornare questa opzione nelle impostazioni.
onboarding.warning_text_1: Il tuo portafoglio e gli account saranno
onboarding.warning_text_4: Potrai recuperarli ESCLUSIVAMENTE con la Frase di Recupero del tuo portafoglio. MetaMask non ti può aiutare a recuperarli.
onboarding.sync_existing: Sincronizza il tuo portafoglio MetaMask esistente dall'estensione del browser o importalo manualmente.
onboarding.scan_title: Passi per sincronizzare con l'estensione MetaMask
onboarding.scan_step_4: Scansione il codice QR ed inizia la sincronizzazione
onboarding.your_wallet: Il tuo portafoglio è stato cancellato con successo

onboarding_carousel.title3: La tua porta d'ingresso al web3
onboarding_carousel.subtitle1: Utilizzato da milioni di persone, MetaMask è il portafoglio sicuro che rende il mondo del web3 accessibile a tutti.
onboarding_carousel.subtitle2: Conserva, spendi ed invia risorse digitali come token, ethereum e collezionabili unici.
onboarding_carousel.subtitle3: Accedi a MetaMark ed effettua transazioni per investire, guadagnare, giocare, vendere e molto altro!

step1.title: Benvenuto sul tuo nuovo portafoglio!
step1.content1: Per utilizzare la blockchain, hai bisogno di un portafoglio! Alcune attività hanno un consto in Ether (ETH).
step1.content2: Ti mostreremo come puoi acquistare ETH, oppure puoi chiederne un pò ad un amico.

step2.title: I tuoi Conti
step2.content1: Questo è il tuo primo conto, il suo valore totale, ed il suo indirizzo pubblico unico (0x...).
step2.content2: Puoi creare molteplici conti in questo portafoglio premi l'icona del profilo.

step3.title: Modificata Nome Conto
step3.content1: Perché non dare al tuo conto un nome memorabile ed unico?
step3.content3: per modificare il nome del tuo conto.

step4.title: Navigazione Principale
step4.content2: per accedere al tuo Portafoglio, Browser, ed alla storia delle transazioni.
step4.content3: Puoi effetturali altre operazioni con i tuoi conti ed accedere alle impostazioni di MetaMask.

step5.title: Esplora il Browser
step5.content1: Puoi esplorare il web3 utilizzando il browser

step6.title: Cerca
step6.content: Cerca siti, o digita l'URL se sai dove devi andare.

import_wallet.title: Sei già utente di MetaMask?
import_wallet.sync_help_step_four: 4. Scansione il codice QR ed inizia a sincronizzare
import_wallet.import_from_seed_button: Importa utilizzando la frase di ripristino segreta

login.title: Bentornato!
login.go_back: Non riesci ad accedere? Puoi CANCELLARE il tuo attuale portafoglio e crearne uno nuovo
login.cant_proceed: Non puoi continuare finché non digiti la parola ‘Cancella’. Facendo ciò accetti di cancellare il tuo attuale portafoglio.
login.type_delete: Digita ‘%{delete}’ per cancellare il tuo attuale portafoglio permanentemente
login.are_you_sure: Sei sicuro di voler cancellare il tuo portafoglio?
login.your_current_wallet: Il tuo attuale portafoglio, i conti e le risorse saranno
login.this_action: Questa azione non può essere annullata.
login.you_can_only: Puoi ripristinare il tuo portafoglio ESCLUSIVAMENNTE con la tua
login.metamask_does_not: MetaMask non possiede la tua Frase Segreta di Ripristino.
login.clean_vault_error: MetaMask ha incontrato un errore dovuto al raggiungimento del limite di memoria. I tuoi dati locali sono stati corrotti. Per favore, re-installa MetaMask e ripristina usando la tua Frase Segreta di Ripristino.

enter_password.title: Inserisci la tua password
enter_password.desc: Per favore inserisci la tua password per continuare

choose_password.title: Crea password
choose_password.subtitle: Questa password sbloccherà il tuo portafoglio MetaMask solo su questo dispositivo.
choose_password.import_with_seed_phrase: Importa con Frase Segreta di Recupero
choose_password.password_length_error: La password deve essere lunga almeno 8 caratteri
choose_password.security_alert_message: Per poter procedere, hai bisogno di attivare un Codice di accesso o un metodo di autenticazione biometrica supportata dal tuo dispositivo (FaceID, TouchID or Impronta Digitale)
choose_password.i_understand: Ho capito che MetaMask non può recuperare questa password per me.
choose_password.confirm: Conferma la Frase Segreta di Recupero
choose_password.disable_biometric_error: Hai disattivato l'accesso biometrico all'app. Aggiorna l'impostazione Ricordami e prova di nuovo.

reset_password.title: Cambia password
reset_password.subtitle: Questa password sbloccherà il tuo portafoglio MetaMask solo su questo dispositivo.
reset_password.import_with_seed_phrase: Importa con Frase Segreta di Recupero
reset_password.password_length_error: La password deve essere lunga almeno 8 caratteri
reset_password.security_alert_message: Per poter procedere, hai bisogno di attivare un Codice di accesso o un metodo di autenticazione biometrica supportata dal tuo dispositivo (FaceID, TouchID or Impronta Digitale)
reset_password.i_understand: Ho capito che MetaMask non può recuperare questa password per me.
reset_password.confirm: Conferma la Frase Segreta di Recupero
reset_password.successfully_changed: La password è stata cambiata con successo

import_from_seed.title: Importa da seme
import_from_seed.seed_phrase_placeholder: Inserisci la tua Frase Segreta di Recupero
import_from_seed.password_length_error: La password deve essere lunga almeno 8 caratteri
import_from_seed.seed_phrase_requirements: La Frase Segreta di Recupero contiene 12, 15, 18, 21, o 24 parole
import_from_seed.invalid_seed_phrase: Frase Segreta di Recupero non valida
import_from_seed.invalid_qr_code_message: Questo codice QR non rappresenta una Frase Segreta di Recupero valida

drawer.submit_feedback_message: Scegli il tipo di feedback da inviare.

send.title: Invia
send.deeplink_failure: Ooops! Qualcosa è andato storto! Prova di nuovo per favore

wallet.title: Portafoglio
wallet.token_removal_issue_desc: C'è stato un problema nel rimuovere il token. Prova di nuovo.
wallet.token_removed_desc: Se cambi idea, puoi aggiungerli di nuovo premendo su "Importa Tokens"
wallet.collectible_removed_desc: Se cambi idea, puoi aggiungerli di nuovo premendo su "Importa NFTs"
wallet.logout_to_import_seed: Devi prima scollegarti per poter importare una Frase Segreta di Recupero.
wallet.ready_to_explore: Sei pronto per esplorare le applicazioni sulla blockchain?
wallet.unable_to_load: Non è stato possibile caricare il saldo

add_asset.title: Importa tokens
add_asset.warning_body_description: Chiunque può creare un token, incluso creare versioni contraffatte di token esistenti. Per saperne di più
add_asset.token_detection_feature: Novità! Il rilevamento dei token migliorato è disponibile su Ethereum Mainnet come funzionalità sperimentale.

privacy_policy.title: Politica sulla Riservatezza
privacy_policy.description: Questi dati sono aggregati e quindi anonimi per gli scopi del General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679. Per maggiori informazioni riguardo le pratiche sulla riservatezza, ti preghiamo di far riferimento alle nostre Politiche di Riservatezza
privacy_policy.description_content_1: MetaMask vorrebbe raccorgliere dati base di utilizzo per meglio comprendere come i nostri utenti interagiscono con l'app. Tali dati verranno utilizzati per migliorare continuamente l'usabilità e l'esperienza dell'utente del nostro prodotto.
privacy_policy.action_description_1: Ti permettera sempre di cancellare l'adesione tramite Impostazioni
privacy_policy.action_description_2: Invia eventi di click e visualizzazione pagine anonimizzate
privacy_policy.action_description_3: Invia dati sulla nazione, regione, città (non luogo specifico)
privacy_policy.action_description_4: Non colleziona mai chiavi, indirizzi, transazioni, saldi, hashes, o qualsiasi altra informazione personale
privacy_policy.action_description_6: Non vende dati per profitto. Mai!

token.address_cant_be_empty: L'indirizzo del Token non può essere vuoto.
token.address_must_be_valid: L'indirizzo del Token deve essere un indirizzo valido.
token.symbol_cant_be_empty: Il simbolo del Token non può essere vuoto.
token.decimals_cant_be_empty: I decimali del Token non possono essere vuoti.
token.no_tokens_found: Non possiamo trovare alcun token con questo nome.
token.address_must_be_smart_contract: Rilevato indirizzo personale. Inserisci l'indirizzo del contratto del token.

collectible.address_must_be_valid: L'indirizzo del Collezionabile deve essere un indirizzo valido.
collectible.address_must_be_smart_contract: Rilevato indirizzo personale. Inserisci l'indirizzo del contratto del collezionabile.
collectible.address_cant_be_empty: L'indirizzo del Collezionabile non può essere vuoto.
collectible.token_id_cant_be_empty: L'identificativo del Collezionabile non può essere vuoto.
collectible.not_owner_error: Non sei il proprietario di questo collezionabile, per cui non puoi aggiungerlo.
collectible.ownership_verification_error: Non possiamo verificare la proprietà. Questo può dipendere dal fatto che lo standard non è supportato oppure la risorsa non esiste nella rete selezionata.

app_settings.title: Impostazioni
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_down: Il tuo gateway IPFS non e' raggiungibile
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_desc: Scegli il tuo IPFS gateway preferito.
app_settings.auto_lock_desc: Scegli dopo quanto tempo l'applicazione si blocca automaticamente.
app_settings.state_logs_desc: Questo aiuterà MetaMask a risolvere qualsiasi problema che puoi incontrare. Per favore invia al supporto di MetaMask via icona menu > Invia Feedback, oppure risponsi al ticket esistente se ne hai uno.
app_settings.clear_approvals_modal_message: Tutte le dapps avranno bisogno di richiedere nuovamente accesso ai dati sul conto.
app_settings.clear_browser_history_modal_message: We are about to remove all your browser history. Are you sure?
app_settings.clear_cookies_modal_message: We are about to remove your browser's cookies. Are you sure?
app_settings.reset_account_modal_message: Resetting your account will clear your transaction history.
app_settings.invalid_rpc_prefix: URIs require the appropriate HTTPS prefix
app_settings.sync_with_extension_desc: This will import all extension accounts to this device.
app_settings.protect_desc: Protect your wallet by saving your Secret Recovery Phrase in various places like on a piece of paper, password manager and/or the cloud.
app_settings.seedphrase_not_backed_up: Important! Secret Recovery Phrase not backed up
app_settings.privacy_mode_desc: Websites must request access to view your account information.
app_settings.show_hex_data_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.custom_nonce_desc: Turn this on to change the nonce (transaction number) on confirmation screens. This is an advanced feature, use cautiously.
app_settings.accounts_identicon_desc: Jazzicons and Blockies are two different styles of unique icons that help you identify an account at a glance.
app_settings.general_desc: Currency conversion, primary currency, language and search engine
app_settings.advanced_desc: Access developer features, reset account, setup testnets, sync with extension, state logs, IPFS gateway and custom RPC
app_settings.contacts_desc: Add, edit, remove, and manage your accounts
app_settings.security_desc: Privacy settings, MetaMetrics, private key and wallet Secret Recovery Phrase
app_settings.networks_desc: Add and edit custom RPC networks
app_settings.remove_network_title: Do you want to remove this network?
app_settings.conversion_desc: Display fiat values in using a specific currency throughout the application.
app_settings.primary_currency_desc: Select Native to prioritize displaying values in the native currency of the chain (e.g. ETH). Select Fiat to prioritize displaying values in your selected fiat currency.
app_settings.language_desc: Translate the application to a different supported language.
app_settings.engine_desc: Change the default search engine used when entering search terms in the URL bar.
app_settings.reset_desc: This action will clear your transaction history. This data might not be retrievable.
app_settings.rpc_desc: Use a custom RPC-capable network via URL instead of one of the provided networks.
app_settings.hex_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.clear_privacy_desc: Clear privacy data so all websites must request access to view account information again.
app_settings.clear_history_desc: Choose this option to clear your entire browsing history.
app_settings.clear_cookies_desc: Choose this option to clear your browser's cookies.
app_settings.metametrics_description: Participate in MetaMetrics to help us make MetaMask better.
app_settings.third_party_description: Third party APIs (Etherscan) are used to show your incoming transactions in the history. Turn off if you don’t want us to pull data from those services.
app_settings.metametrics_restart_required: You need to restart the app for the changes to take effect.
app_settings.invalid_password_message: The password was not correct. Please try again.
app_settings.failed_to_fetch_chain_id: Could not fetch chain ID. Is your RPC URL correct?
app_settings.endpoint_returned_different_chain_id: The endpoint returned a different chain ID: %{chainIdReturned}
app_settings.chain_id_required: The chain ID is required. It must match the chain ID returned by the network. You can enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_hex_number_leading_zeros: Invalid hexadecimal number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number: Invalid number. Enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_number_leading_zeros: Invalid number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number_range: Invalid number. Enter a number between 1 and %{maxSafeChainId}
app_settings.hide_zero_balance_tokens_desc: Prevents tokens with no balance from displaying in your token listing.
app_settings.token_detection_description: We use third-party APIs to detect and display new tokens sent to your wallet. Turn off if you don’t want the app to pull data from those services.

reveal_credential.seed_phrase_title: Monstra la Frase Segreta di Recupero
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_explanation: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this Secret Recovery Phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
reveal_credential.private_key_explanation: Save it somewhere safe and secret.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning: This is the private key for the current selected account: {{accountName}}. Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private key can fully control your account, including transferring away any of your funds.
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_warning_explanation: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone! These words can be used to steal all your accounts.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning_explanation: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private key can fully control your account, including transferring away any of your funds.
reveal_credential.seed_phrase: La tua Frase Segreta di Recupero
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_copied: La Frase Segreta di Recupero è stata temporaneamente copiata negli appunti
reveal_credential.private_key_copied: Private key temporarily copied to clipboard
reveal_credential.unknown_error: Couldn't unlock your account. Please try again.
reveal_credential.seed_warning: This is your wallet's 12 word phrase. This phrase can be used to take control of all of your current and future accounts, including the ability to send away any of their funds. Keep this phrase stored safely, DO NOT share it with anyone.

password_reset.password_desc: Choose a strong password to unlock MetaMask app on your device. If you lose this password, you will need your Secret Recovery Phrase to re-import your wallet.

qr_scanner.invalid_qr_code_message: The QR code that you are trying to scan it is not valid.
qr_scanner.allow_camera_dialog_message: We need your permission to scan QR codes
qr_scanner.attempting_to_scan_with_wallet_locked: Looks like you're trying to scan a QR code, you need to unlock your wallet to be able to use it.
qr_scanner.attempting_sync_from_wallet_error:
Looks like you're trying to sync with the extension. In order to do so, you will need to erase your current wallet. 

Once you've erased or reinstalled a fresh version of the app, select the option to "Sync with MetaMask Extension". Important! Before erasing your wallet, make sure you've backed up your Secret Recovery Phrase.

transaction.this_is_an_advanced: This is an advanced feature used to cancel or speed up any pending transactions.
transaction.think_of_the_nonce: Think of the nonce as the transaction number of an account. Every account's nonce begins with 0 for the first transaction and continues in sequential order.
transaction.nonce_warning: Warning: You may encounter issues with future transactions if you continue. Use with caution.
transaction.insufficient_amount: You need {{amount}} more {{tokenSymbol}} to complete this transaction.
transaction.high_gas_price: Your gas fee may be set unnecessarily high ({{currentGasPrice}}). Consider lowering the amount.
transaction.approve_warning: By approving this action, you grant permission for this contract to spend up to
transaction.cancel_tx_message: Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be cancelled. If the cancellation attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.
transaction.speedup_tx_message: Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be accelerated. If the speed up attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.
transaction.not_enough_for_gas: You have 0 {{ticker}} in your account to pay for transaction fees. Buy some {{ticker}} or deposit from another account.
transaction.tokenContractAddressWarning_3: . If you send tokens to this address, you will lose them.
transaction.smartContractAddressWarning: This address is a smart contract address. Please make sure you understand what this address is for, otherwise you risk losing your funds.
transaction.gas_education_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction.gas_education_4: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexitity.
transaction.confusable_msg: We have detected a confusable character in the ENS name. Check the ENS name to avoid a potential scam.
transaction.dapp_suggested_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. It’s using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate. However, editing this gas fee may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.
transaction.dapp_suggested_eip1559_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. Overriding this may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.

custom_gas.warning_gas_limit: Gas limit must be greater than 20999
custom_gas.warning_gas_limit_estimated: Estimated gas limit is {{gas}}, use it as minimum value
custom_gas.cost_explanation: The gas fee covers the cost of processing your transaction on the Ethereum network. MetaMask does not profit from this fee. The higher the fee the better chances of your transaction getting processed.

spend_limit_edition.title: Edit permission
spend_limit_edition.allow_explanation: to withdraw and spend up to the following amount:
spend_limit_edition.allow_to_access: Give this site permission to access your {{tokenSymbol}}?
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_site: Do you trust this site? By granting this permission, you're allowing this site to access your funds.
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_address: Do you trust this address? By granting this permission, you're allowing this address to access your funds.
spend_limit_edition.transaction_fee_explanation: A transaction fee is associated with this permission.
spend_limit_edition.details_explanation: {{host}} may access and spend up to this max amount from this account.
spend_limit_edition.all_set_desc: You’ve successfully set permissions for this site.

browser.title: Browser
browser.dapp_browser_message: MetaMask is your wallet and browser for the decentralized web. Have a look around!
browser.no_tabs_desc: To browse the decentralized web, add a new tab
browser.failed_to_resolve_ens_name: We couldn't resolve that ENS name
browser.remove_bookmark_msg: Do you really want to remove this site from your favorites?

transactions.import_wallet_tip: All future transactions made from this device will include a label "from this device" next to the timestamp. For transactions dated before adding the account, this history will not indicate which outgoing transactions originated from this device.

address_book.add_this_address: Add this address to your address book
address_book.name: Name

sync_with_extension.title: Sync data from Extension
sync_with_extension.label: Open the MetaMask extension in your desktop browser, then go to "Settings" > "Advanced", click on "Sync with Mobile" and then enter your password to see the QR Code
sync_with_extension.please_wait: Please wait while we sync your data...
sync_with_extension.error_message: Something went wrong... Please try again
sync_with_extension.warning_message: This will override all your current accounts and transaction history in your mobile phone. Are you sure?
sync_with_extension.invalid_qr_code_desc: This isn't the right QR code! To sync with your browser extension, go to "Settings" > "Advanced" > Sync with Mobile in the browser extension and scan the QR there
sync_with_extension.outdated_qr_code_desc: This seems to be an expired QR code!  Please try scanning a new one
sync_with_extension.something_wrong_desc: We are having issues while trying to sync your wallet. Please try again later or import your wallet using your Secret Recovery Phrase
sync_with_extension.allow_biometrics_desc: You can use {{biometrics}} to authenticate on MetaMask

sync_with_extension_success.title: Wallet imported
sync_with_extension_success.sync_complete_1: Just remember, MetaMask cannot recover your Secret Recovery Phrase should you lose it. You can find the Secret Recovery Phrase in
sync_with_extension_success.password_tip: The password to unlock your mobile wallet is the same one you set for the extension.

networks.title: Networks
networks.status_not_ok: The network is having some issues

signature_request.title: Signature Request
signature_request.eth_sign_warning: Signing this message can be dangerous. This signature could potentially perform any operation on your account's behalf, including granting complete control of your account and all of its assets to the requesting site. Only sign this message if you know what you're doing or completely trust the requesting site.

watch_asset_request.title: Add Suggested Token
watch_asset_request.message: Would you like to add this token?

authentication.auth_prompt_desc: Please authenticate in order to use MetaMask
authentication.fingerprint_prompt_desc: Use your fingerprint to unlock MetaMask

accountApproval.title: CONNECT REQUEST
accountApproval.warning: By clicking connect, you allow this dapp to view your public address. This is an important security step to protect your data from potential phishing risks.

import_private_key.title: Import Account
import_private_key.description_one: Imported accounts are viewable in your wallet but are not recoverable with your MetaMask Secret Recovery Phrase.
import_private_key.learn_more_here: Learn more about imported accounts here.
import_private_key.subtitle: Paste your private key string
import_private_key.error_message: We couldn't import that private key. Please make sure you entered it correctly.
import_private_key.error_empty_message: You need to enter your private key.

import_private_key_success.title: Account successfully imported!
import_private_key_success.description_one: You'll now be able to view your account in MetaMask.

secure_your_wallet.title: Secure your wallet
secure_your_wallet.info_text_1: Take a few moments to finish setting up your MetaMask wallet.
secure_your_wallet.info_text_2: This will ensure only you can access your funds and will let you recover your wallet if you lose your device

account_backup_step_1.title: Secure your wallet
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_4: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
account_backup_step_1.skip_check: I understand that if I lose my Secret Recovery Phrase I will not be able to access my wallet.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_1: A Secret Recovery Phrase is a set of twelve words that contains all the information about your wallet, including your funds. It’s like a secret code used to access your entire wallet.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_2: You must keep your Secret Recovery Phrase secret and safe. If someone gets your Secret Recovery Phrase, they’ll gain control over your accounts.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_3: Save it in a place where only you can access it. If you lose it, not even MetaMask can help you recover it.

account_backup_step_1B.title: Secure your wallet
account_backup_step_1B.manual_subtitle: Write down your Secret Recovery Phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place.
account_backup_step_1B.risks_2: You forget where you put it
account_backup_step_1B.other_options: Other options: Doesn’t have to be paper!
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your Secret Recovery Phrase in a place you trust.
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_2: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.

account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_2.title: Grab a pen and paper
account_backup_step_2.info: Next step is to write your Secret Recovery Phrase down.

account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_3.title: Is anyone watching?
account_backup_step_3.info_text: Make sure no other human or robot is watching your screen. If your Secret Recovery Phrase is copied, it can be used on other devices to steal your funds

account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your Secret Recovery Phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_no: No, back up Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_4.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_4.info_text_1: Carefully write down these words on paper. Their order matters.
account_backup_step_4.info_text_2: You'll be asked to re-enter it on the next screen
account_backup_step_4.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

account_backup_step_5.error_message: The order of the words is incorrect. Please make sure you wrote it down correctly and go to the previous screen if it is necessary
account_backup_step_5.title: Confirm Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_5.info_text: Insert each word in the order it was presented to you on the previous screen.
account_backup_step_5.modal_text: This was to ensure you follow this security measure

account_backup_step_6.title: Security Tips
account_backup_step_6.info_text: MetaMask cannot recover your Secret Recovery Phrase if you lose it
account_backup_step_6.tip_1: Keep multiple backups of your Secret Recovery Phrase
account_backup_step_6.tip_2: Store the phrase in a trusted password manager and paper backups in a safe place
account_backup_step_6.tip_3: Never share this phrase with anyone
account_backup_step_6.disclaimer: * You can find your Secret Recovery Phrase if you go to

manual_backup_step_1.action: Write down your Secret Recovery Phrase
manual_backup_step_1.info: This is your Secret Recovery Phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
manual_backup_step_1.reveal: Tap to reveal your Secret Recovery Phrase
manual_backup_step_1.watching: Make sure no one is watching your screen.
manual_backup_step_1.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

manual_backup_step_2.info: Select each word in the order it was presented to you.

manual_backup_step_3.success: You’ve successfully protected your wallet. Remember to keep your Secret Recovery Phrase safe, it's your responsibility!
manual_backup_step_3.recover: MetaMask cannot recover your wallet should you lose it. You can find your Secret Recovery Phrase in Settings > Security & Privacy.
manual_backup_step_3.leave_hint: Leave yourself a hint. Write the location / where you saved it to remind yourself how you can access it. This information does not leave your device.
manual_backup_step_3.no_seedphrase: Do not use this to write your Secret Recovery Phrase.

phishing.intro: is currently on the MetaMask domain warning list. This means that based on information available to us, MetaMask believes this domain could currently compromise your security and, as an added safety feature, MetaMask has restricted access to the site. To override this, please read the rest of this warning for instructions on how to continue at your own risk.
phishing.reasons: There are many reasons sites can appear on our warning list, and our warning list compiles from other widely used industry lists. Such reasons can include known fraud or security risks, such as domains that test positive on the
phishing.list_content: Domains on these warning lists may include outright malicious websites and legitimate websites that have been compromised by a malicious actor.
phishing.to_read_more: To read more about this site
phishing.review_on_etherscam: please review the domain on Etherscam.
phishing.warning: Note that this warning list is compiled on a voluntary basis. This list may be inaccurate or incomplete. Just because a domain does not appear on this list is not an implicit guarantee of that domain's safety. As always, your transactions are your own responsibility. If you wish to interact with any domain on our warning list, you can do so by
phishing.file_an_issue_intro: If you think this domain is incorrectly flagged or if a blocked legitimate website has resolved its security issues,

step_1.title: Before you purchase ETH, understand gas fees
step_1.subtitle_1: If you plan to swap or transfer your ETH, purchase extra to cover gas fees.
step_1.subtitle_2: Gas fees for transactions are separate from the cost of purchasing ETH.
step_1.subtitle_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_2.title: What are gas fees?
step_2.subtitle_1: Gas powers transactions on the Ethereum network. It’s a fee paid in ETH to the crypto miners who process your transactions.
step_2.subtitle_2: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_3.title: How much do I need?
step_3.subtitle_1: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and type of transaction.
step_3.subtitle_2: A complex transaction like “swapping” may cost 5x - 10x more than a “send” transaction.
step_3.subtitle_3: The best way to estimate gas fees is to
step_3.subtitle_5: and see how much gas costs.

swaps.feature_off_body: MetaMask Swaps is undergoing maintenance. Please check back later.
swaps.wrong_network_body: You’re only able to swap tokens on the Ethereum Main Network.
swaps.unallowed_asset_body: Some tokens with unique mechanics are currently not supported for swapping.
swaps.verify_on: Always verify the token address on

swaps.make_sure_trade: and make sure this is the token you want to trade.
swaps.token_multiple: Multiple tokens can use the same name and symbol.

swaps.token_address_can_be_found: Token contract addresses can be found on

swaps.add_warning: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects.
swaps.not_enough: Not enough {{symbol}} to complete this swap
swaps.slippage_info: If the rate changes between the time your order is placed and confirmed it’s called “slippage”. Your Swap will automatically cancel if slippage exceeds your “max slippage” setting.
swaps.slippage_warning: Make sure you know what you’re doing!
swaps.more_gas_to_complete: more for gas to complete this swap.
swaps.market_price_unavailable: Market price is unavailable and price impact is therefore unknown. Please verify that you are comfortable with the amount of tokens you will receive before swapping.
swaps.price_difference_body: The difference in market prices can be affected by fees taken by intermediaries, size of market, size of trade, or market inefficiencies.
swaps.price_impact_body: Price impact is the difference between the current market price and the amount received during transaction execution. Price impact is a function of the size of your trade relative to the size of the liquidity pool.
swaps.quotes_update_often_text: Quotes are updated often to reflect current market conditions.

fee_text.fee_is_applied: A fee of {{fee}} is automatically factored into each quote, which supports ongoing development to make MetaMask even better.

quote_source_rfq.3: who responds with a quote directly.

quote_source_agg.3: which finds the best price by splitting your order between different decentralized exchanges.

quote_source_cnt.1: This quote comes directly from a
quote_source_cnt.3: that wraps and unwraps native tokens which can save on gas costs.

swaps.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

swaps.gas_education_8: is the most you’ll spend. When the network is volatile this can be a large amount.

protect_wallet_modal.title: Protect your wallet
protect_wallet_modal.text: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your Secret Recovery Phrase in a place you trust.
protect_wallet_modal.text_bold: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.

error_screen.submit_ticket_1: Please report this issue so we can fix it:
error_screen.submit_ticket_2: Take a screenshot of this screen.
error_screen.submit_ticket_7: Please include the error message and the screenshot.
error_screen.save_seedphrase_3: & re-install the app. Note: you can NOT restore your wallet without your Secret Recovery Phrase.

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.swaps_warning: Swaps are very time sensitive. “High” will help avoid potential loses due to changes in market conditions.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.priority_fee_at_least_0_error: Priority fee must be at least 1 GWEI

learn_more.title: How should I choose?
learn_more.intro: Selecting the right gas fee depends on the type of transaction and how important it is to you.
learn_more.high_text: This is best for time sensitive transactions (like Swaps) as it increases the likelihood of a successful transaction. If a Swap takes too long to process it may fail and result in losing some of your gas fee.
learn_more.medium_text: A medium gas fee is good for sending, withdrawing or other non-time sensitive transactions. This setting will most often result in a successful transaction.
learn_more.low_text: A low gas fee should only be used for unimportant transactions or when network traffic is very low. With a lower fee it can be hard to predict when (or if) your transaction will be successful.

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_low: Max Priority Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_high: Max Priority Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_speed_up_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_cancel_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_low: Max Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_high: Max Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_speed_up_low: Max Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_cancel_low: Max Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Max priority fee” and “Max fee”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_priority_fee: Max priority fee (aka “miner tip”) goes directly to miners and incentivizes them to prioritize your transaction. You’ll most often pay your max setting.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_fee: The max fee is the most you’ll pay (base fee + priority fee).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_new_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 10% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_cancel_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 50% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit_legacy: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Gas price”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_price: This network requires a “Gas price” field when submitting a transaction. Gas price is the maximum amount you are willing to pay per unit of gas.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_low: Gas price is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_high: Gas price is higher than necessary

transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_4: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_5: Gas fees are set by the network and fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexity.
transaction_review_eip1559.legacy_gas_suggestion_tooltip: This gas fee suggestion is using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate.

times_eip1559.warning_unknown: Your max fee or max priority fee may be low for current market conditions. We don’t know when (or if) your transaction will be processed.
times_eip1559.warning_low: This lowers your maximum fee but if network traffic increases your transaction may be delayed or fail.
